page.title: 07Shopping.
page.content: Whitchurch is only a small shopping centre for the people who live in the town and those people who live in the small villages that surround Whitchurch.There are very few people who would shop in Whitchurch because it has not a large number of shops. You can buy most of the things that you need for everyday life in Whitchurch,you could do all your weekly food shopping in Whitchurch if you wished but a lot of people who live in Whitchurch prefer to do their shopping in supermarkets in towns such as Basingstoke,Andover and Winchester.People tend to shop for just one or two items rather than doing their main shopping.
